text: KittyRec brings back all the feels of classic Rec Room. The community is incredible and the gameplay is exactly how I remember it from years ago. Can't believe how much I missed this experience!
author: Alex

text: While playing KittyRec during our testing, playing made it feel so much more social than current day RR, and we want to share that with others. This project is about bringing people together, reliving the past, and creating a fun, welcoming space for everyone to enjoy.
author: Lynee

text: I've been playing Rec Room since 2017, and KittyRec perfectly captures what made it special. The nostalgic feel combined with modern improvements makes this a must-play for anyone who misses the good old days.
author: Jordan

text: The attention to detail in KittyRec is remarkable. From the classic UI to the way interactions feel, it's like stepping back in time but with all the quality-of-life improvements we've come to expect in 2025.
author: Taylor

text: As someone who joined Rec Room late, I never got to experience the 'golden era' everyone talks about. KittyRec gave me that chance, and now I understand what all the nostalgia was about. This is truly special.
author: Riley
